title: The problem with the changes to miss fortune
body: The benifit of reactivAting strut is tied to her attack steroid thus I can choose to activate my steroid when I trade or fight which now puts any potential for using strut on cool down it just makes no sense to tie them together. I won't even talk much about how near useless activating strut is because is most cAses you need to activate it would almost immediately be broken but beyond that the problem still lies in the fact you tied it to her steroid... Just give her back grevous wounds which ties in better to activating her steroid.

replies.body: The problem with MF changes are she is still a short range immobile ADC.

Stop being so close to the enemy. 550 range is pretty average for ADCs range, and her ult is still dangerous if positioned right (and if that never happens, she's going to be auto-attacking anyways, which still hurts.)
She needs mobility.  Not a passive that basically makes her permaslowed as soon as she enters combat.
